en-us.whichVersion: Which version of C++ are you using?
en-us.isDerived: Does your class directly inherit from another class?
en-us.hasVirtualFunctions: Does your class have any virtual functions?
en-us.isVirtuallyDerived: Does your class virtually inherit from another class?
en-us.hasRefMembers: Does your class have any reference members?
en-us.hasConstMembers: Does your class have any const members?
en-us.allHaveDefaultInits: Are they all initialized with a default initializer?
en-us.hasImplicitDeclDefaultCtor: Your class has an implicitly-declared copy constructor.
en-us.hasImplicitDeclCopyCtor: Your class has an implicitly-declared copy constructor.
en-us.hasImplicitDeclCopyAsgn: Your class has an implicitly-declared copy assignment operator.
en-us.hasTrivialCopyAsgn: Your copy assignment operator is trivial.
en-us.hasImplicitDeclMoveCtor: Your class has an implicitly-declared move constructor.
en-us.hasImplicitDeclMoveAsgn: Your class has an implicitly-declared move assignment operator.
en-us.hasTrivialMoveAsgn: Your move assignment operator is trivial.
en-us.hasImplicitDtor: Your class has an implicit destructor.
en-us.hasUserDeclaredDefaultCtor: Have you declared a default constructor?
en-us.hasUserDeclaredCopyCtor: Have you declared a copy constructor?
en-us.hasUserDeclaredCopyAsgn: Have you declared a copy assignment operator?
en-us.hasUserDeclaredMoveCtor: Have you declared a move constructor?
en-us.hasUserDeclaredMoveAsgn: Have you declared a move assignment operator?
en-us.isUserCtorDefaulted: Is this constructor defaulted with = default;?
en-us.isUserCtorDeleted: Is this constructor deleted with = delete;?
en-us.isUserAsgnDefaulted: Is this operator defaulted with = default;?
en-us.isUserAsgnDeleted: Is this operator deleted with = delete;?
en-us.isUserDtorDefaulted: Is this destructor defaulted with = default;?
en-us.isUserDtorDeleted: Is this destructor deleted with = default;?
en-us.areBaseClassDefaultCtorsAccessible: Do your direct or virtual base classes have accessible default constructors?
en-us.areBaseClassDefaultCtorsTrivial: Do all your direct or virtual base classes have trivial default constructors?
en-us.areBaseClassCopyCtorsAccessible: Can all of your direct or virtual base classes be copied?
en-us.areBaseClassCopyCtorsTrivial: Are all of your direct or virtual base class copy constructors trivial?
en-us.areBaseClassCopyAsgnsAccessible: Can all of your direct or virtual base classes be copy assigned?
en-us.areBaseClassCopyAsgnsTrivial: Are all of your direct or virtual base class copy assignment operators trivial?
en-us.areBaseClassMoveCtorsAccessible: Can all of your direct or virtual base classes be moved?
en-us.areBaseClassMoveCtorsTrivial: Are all of your direct or virtual base class move constructors trivial?
en-us.areBaseClassMoveAsgnsAccessible: Can all of your direct or virtual base classes be move assigned?
en-us.areBaseClassMoveAsgnsTrivial: Are all of your direct or virtual base class move assignment operators trivial?
en-us.areBaseClassDtorsAccessible: Do all of your direct or virtual base classes have an accessible destructor?
en-us.areBaseClassDtorsTrivial: Are all of your direct or virtual base class destructors virtual?
en-us.hasMembersInaccessibleCtor: Do you have any members with an inaccessible default constructor?
en-us.undefinedImplicitDefaultCtor: Your class has an implicitly-declared default constructor, but it is undefined.
en-us.hasDefinedImplicitDefaultCtor: Your class has an implicitly-declared and defined default constructor.
en-us.deletedImplicitDefaultCtor: Your class has an implicitly-declared default constructor, but it is deleted
en-us.noImplicitDeclDefaultCtor: Your class does not have an implicitly-declared default constructor.
en-us.nonStaticMembersHaveDefaultCtor: Does every non-static data member have a trivial default constructor?
en-us.noTrivialDefaultCtor: Your class does not have a trivial default constructor.
en-us.userDeclaredCopyCtorSignature: What is the signature of your copy constructor?
en-us.userDeclaredCopyAsgnSignature: What is the signature of your copy assignment operator?
